mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) from association a left JOIN ass_users au on a.id=au.association_id WHERE a.user_id=#{userId} AND a.delete_status=1 and au.delete_status=1
SELECT ac.* from activity ac LEFT JOIN association s on ac.association_id =s.id WHERE s.user_id=#{userId} AND s.id=#{id} AND s.delete_status=1 and ac.delete_status=1
SELECT a.id,a.name from association a where a.user_id=#{userId} AND a.delete_status=1
mapper.update: update ass_users set is_accept=#{is_accept} where user_id=#{user_id} and association_id=#{association_id} AND delete_status=1

UPDATE activity SET name = #{name}, details = #{details}, association_id = #{association_id}, start_time = #{start_time}, end_time = #{end_time}, is_open = #{is_open} WHERE id = #{id} AND delete_status=1
